content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

No structures have been successfully created on the map as of the current execution steps.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the target tile is not occupied by another entity or obstacle before attempting to place an entity. Multiple attempts to place a Wooden Chest and a Stone Furnace failed due to occupied tiles.

### Errors in movement commands
- When using movement commands, ensure that indices are correctly specified as integers. Errors occurred due to incorrect index types in movement commands.

### Errors due to obstacles
- Perform a thorough scan of the area to identify obstacles before attempting to place entities. This will help in planning the placement of structures effectively.
